summary.span: 表示从数字化仪和触笔收集到的单个数据点。

span.span: Represents a single data point collected from the digitizer and stylus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户使用数字化仪输入墨迹时, 将收集数据。A collects data when a user inputs ink using the digitizer. 由于数字化器报表的信息根据制造商的不同而异, 因此中的属性可能会有所不同。Because the information that a digitizer reports differs depending on the manufacturer, the properties within a can vary. 若要确定某一属性是否在中, 请调用方法。To determine whether a property is in the , call the method. 属性包含用于指定中的属性的。 The property contains a that specifies which properties are in the . 所有对象都包含指定 (x, y) 坐标以及压力的属性。All objects contain properties that specify the (x, y) coordinates, as well as the pressure. ## Examples 下面的示例获取 中每个的属性名称和值。The following example gets property names and values for each in a . 此示例假定存在一个名`packetOutput`为的。This example assumes that there is a called `packetOutput`. [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using specified (x, y) coordinates and pressure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pressureFactor`值必须介于0和1之间 (包括0和 1)。`pressureFactor` must have a value between 0 and 1, inclusive. 如果值为 0, 则表示没有施加压力, 而值1表示应用的压力最大。A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied. 如果值为 0.5, 则表示应用最大压力的 50%, 依此类推。A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建。The following example demonstrates how to create a . summary.span: 获取或设置一个介于 0 和 1 之间的值，以反映在创建 时，触笔施加于数字化仪图面的压力大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value between 0 and 1 that reflects the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface when the is created.

value.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间的值，用于指示在创建 时，触笔施加于数字化仪图面的压力大小。

span.span: Value between 0 and 1 indicating the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface as the is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值表示为介于0和1之间的值。The value of the property is expressed as a value between 0 and 1. 如果值为 0, 则表示没有施加压力, 而值1表示应用的压力最大。A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied. 如果值为 0.5, 则表示应用最大压力的 50%, 依此类推。A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来检索和显示调用`points`的中的每个的压力值。The following example uses the property to retrieve and display the pressure value for each in a called `points`. 此示例假定存在一个名`packetOutput`为的。This example assumes that there is a called `packetOutput`. [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]
